risks.title: Integration delay
risks.detail: Integration with the legacy CRM might be delayed because their team is short-staffed.
risks.mitigation: Engage with the CRM team to understand resource availability.

risks.title: KYC compliance change
risks.detail: If compliance change the KYC rules again, we may need to rework the form fields.
risks.mitigation: Regularly monitor compliance updates and prepare for potential adjustments.

assumptions.title: Document upload method
assumptions.detail: Clients will upload documents via the new portal instead of email.
assumptions.validation_step: Confirm with client feedback during onboarding.

issues.title: Duplicate records delay
issues.detail: Current manual process is causing duplicate records and delays.
issues.next_step: Transition to an automated solution for data entry.

dependencies.title: Address verification API
dependencies.detail: Dependency on the external vendor for address verification API.
